channel.title: How to make a server?
channel.description: Right all i want to know is how do you make a server? and what all this SCAR is about? Im new to this forums but i've played on a few servers such as digitalscape.no-ip.biz PORT: 43594 and mgscape.no-ip.org PORT: 5555 now i really like both of them and now i want to see if i can make my own. Help would be greatful many thanks!

item.title: How to make a server?
item.dc:creator: @lil_wizzy lil wizzy
item.description:
@lil_wizzy wrote:

hmm i suggest that you go and download Mod Tharok’s server creater, it will help you in these problems.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a server?
item.dc:creator: @TigerBoy TigerBoy
item.description:
@TigerBoy wrote:

Ok thats good, but what is the SCAR stuff al about? It that what you compile your .bat file with?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a server?
item.dc:creator: @superwauwie superwauwie
item.description:
@superwauwie wrote:

now the first think you need to do is download a server to start.
go to : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,122377.0.html
if thats done, you will see a file called: compile.bat.
open it and compile your server.
if the compile.bat gives a error you need to go here : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html

follow the instructions. if thats done you need to compile your server with your new compile.bat file.

you have made your own server!

to chance the welcome message you need to open client.java (open with notepad)

i hope this helps!

Read full topic
